text: On this upcoming Shavuot, we will celebrate the beginning of the conversation that is Torah — and at Sefaria, we celebrate the conversation all year long.

Celebrate the gift of Torah by supporting Sefaria’s mission to bring it into the digital age. We’ve set a goal for 500 new Sefaria Sustainers before Shavuot. Will you become a monthly donor right now?
name: 2023-05-04-shavuot
